title: Microsoft deletes tweet featuring an M1 iMac from official Windows account
content:
Twitter is well known for being the place where influencers, celebrities, or even executives mistakenly reveal that they’re using an Apple product when they shouldn’t. However, a recent tweet on the official Windows account – which has now been deleted – featured nothing less than an M1 iMac.

more…

The post Microsoft deletes tweet featuring an M1 iMac from official Windows account appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Microsoft has deleted a tweet from the official Windows account on Twitter showing nothing less than a green M1 iMac .
